borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Non-material amendment to planning permission ref: 2020/00283/FUL grated 29th April 2020 for the 'Erection of a rear roof extension; including raising the ridge height by 200mm, erection of a single storey rear extension to the side of the existing back addition; erection of a rear extension at first floor level on top of the back addition, installation of 2no rooflights in the front roofslope; installation of French doors with Juliet balconies to replace the existing windows at upper ground and first floor level to the rear elevation; replacement of 1no window with a new window at first floor level and 1no door with a window at lower ground floor level to the rear elevation; bricking up of 1no window at upper ground floor level to the side of rear back addition; conversion of the existing dwellinghouse into 2 x 2 bedroom self-contained flats'. Amendments to include installation of French doors with a Juliet balcony in place of a window in the rear roofslope, replacement of the French doors and Juliet balcony with a window at first floor level to the rear elevation, changes to a replacement window on the rear elevation above the back addition; and installation of a new window at upper ground floor level to the rear elevation of the back addition; blocking up of a window to the side of the back addition at first floor level; alteration to size and position of rooflight on flat roof of ground floor extension.
